00015 /*  ========================================================================
00016     TP-ST: Transfer Protocol - Status - 3GPP TS 23.040 V5.1.0 [9.2.3.15]
00017     ========================================================================*/
00019 class ShortMessageStatus {
00020     public:
00023         enum Status { // do not change order 
00025             TransactionCompleted = 0,
00027             TemporaryErrorStillTrying,
00029             PermanentError,
00031             TemporaryError,
00033             ReservedStatus,
00035             InvalidStatus,
00036         };
00037 
00038 
00040         enum Reason { // do not change order 
00042             SmDelivered = 0,
00045             SmDeliveredButUnableToConfirm,  
00047             SmReplaced,
00048 
00050             ReservedReason,
00052             ServiceCenterSpecificReason,
00053             
00055             Congestion,
00057             SmeBusy,
00059             NoResponseFromSme,
00061             ServiceRejected,
00063             QualityOfServiceNotAvailable,
00065             ErrorInSme,
00066 
00068             RemoteProcedureError,
00070             IncompatibleDestination,
00072             ConnectionRejectedBySme,
00074             NotObtainable,
00076             NoInterworkingAvailable,
00078             SmValidityPeriodExpired,
00080             SmDeletedByOriginatingSme,
00082             SmDeletedByScAdministration,
00084             SmDoesNotExist,
00085 
00087             InvalidReason,
00088         };
00089 
00091         ShortMessageStatus();
00092 
00094         ShortMessageStatus(UINT8 incoming_byte);
00095 
00097         UINT8 Get() const { return (m_bit_field.Get()); }
00098 
00100         Status GetStatus() const;
00102         void SetStatus(Status status);
00103 
00105         Reason GetReason() const;
00107         void SetReason(Reason reason);
00108 
00110         void Clear() { m_bit_field.Clear();}
00111 
00112     private:
00113         BitField8 m_bit_field;
00114 };
